HTML
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>Happy Birthday My Love ❤️</title>

<!-- Google Font -->
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@300;500;700&family=Great+Vibes&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>
*{
margin:0;
padding:0;
box-sizing:border-box;
font-family:'Poppins',sans-serif;
}

body{
background:linear-gradient(135deg,#ffd6e7,#ffeef5,#ffd1dc);
overflow-x:hidden;
color:#5a2a3b;
}

/* Floating Hearts */
.heart{
position:fixed;
color:#ff4d88;
font-size:20px;
animation:float 6s linear infinite;
opacity:.7;
}
@keyframes float{
0%{transform:translateY(100vh) scale(0);opacity:0}
50%{opacity:1}
100%{transform:translateY(-10vh) scale(1.4);opacity:0}
}

/* Header */
.hero{
height:100vh;
display:flex;
flex-direction:column;
align-items:center;
justify-content:center;
text-align:center;
}

.title{
font-family:'Great Vibes',cursive;
font-size:70px;
color:#ff2e75;
animation:fadeIn 2s ease forwards;
}

.subtitle{
font-size:22px;
margin-top:10px;
opacity:0;
animation:fadeIn 3s ease forwards;
}

@keyframes fadeIn{
from{opacity:0; transform:translateY(20px);}
to{opacity:1; transform:translateY(0);}
}

/* Letter Section */
.letter{
padding:80px 15%;
line-height:1.8;
font-size:18px;
text-align:center;
}

.letter h2{
font-family:'Great Vibes',cursive;
font-size:50px;
margin-bottom:20px;
color:#ff2e75;
}

/* Gallery */
.gallery{
display:grid;
grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(250px,1fr));
gap:20px;
padding:60px 10%;
}

.gallery img{
width:100%;
height:300px;
object-fit:cover;
border-radius:20px;
box-shadow:0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
transition:transform .4s;
}
.gallery img:hover{
transform:scale(1.07);
}

/* Footer */
footer{
text-align:center;
padding:40px;
font-size:18px;
}

.date{
font-size:26px;
color:#ff2e75;
font-weight:bold;
}

</style>
</head>

<body>

<!-- Floating hearts container -->
<div id="hearts"></div>

<section class="hero">
<h1 class="title">Happy Birthday ❤️</h1>
<p class="subtitle">To the most beautiful girl in my world</p>
<p class="subtitle">18 February 💕</p>
</section>

<section class="letter">
<h2>My Feelings For You 💌</h2>

<p>
(WRITE YOUR MESSAGE HERE)

From the day you came into my life, everything became softer, brighter, and happier.
You are not just special to me — you are my peace, my comfort, and my favorite place.

Every smile of yours fixes a bad day.
Every message of yours feels like home.

I don’t know what I did right to deserve you,
but I promise to always protect your smile.

Happy Birthday my love ❤️
</p>

</section>

<section class="gallery">
<!-- Replace image links with your photos -->
<img src="https://picsum.photos/500/600?1">
<img src="https://picsum.photos/500/600?2">
<img src="https://picsum.photos/500/600?3">
<img src="https://picsum.photos/500/600?4">
</section>

<footer>
<p class="date">Made with love for 18th February 💖</p>
<p>Forever yours ❤️</p>
</footer>

<script>

/* Floating hearts generator */
function createHeart(){
const heart=document.createElement("div");
heart.className="heart";
heart.innerHTML="❤";
heart.style.left=Math.random()*100+"vw";
heart.style.animationDuration=(Math.random()*3+4)+"s";
document.body.appendChild(heart);

setTimeout(()=>{heart.remove()},7000);
}
setInterval(createHeart,300);

</script>

</body>
</html>

🩷 Paste in JS

JavaScript
// PASSWORD
function unlock(){
if(document.getElementById("passInput").value==="aishh"){
document.getElementById("lockScreen").style.display="none";
}else{
document.getElementById("wrong").innerText="Wrong password 💔";
}
}

// PAGE NAVIGATION
let current=0;
const pages=document.querySelectorAll(".page");
function nextPage(){
pages[current].classList.remove("active");
current++;
if(current>=pages.length)current=pages.length-1;
pages[current].classList.add("active");
}

// ENVELOPE
function openLetter(el){
el.classList.toggle("open");
}

// HEART EXPLOSION
document.addEventListener("click",e=>{
for(let i=0;i<12;i++){
let h=document.createElement("div");
h.innerHTML="❤";
h.style.position="fixed";
h.style.left=e.clientX+"px";
h.style.top=e.clientY+"px";
h.style.color="#ff2e75";
h.style.fontSize="20px";
document.body.appendChild(h);

let x=(Math.random()-0.5)*200;
let y=(Math.random()-0.5)*200;

h.animate([
{transform:"translate(0,0)",opacity:1},
{transform:`translate(${x}px,${y}px)`,opacity:0}
],{duration:900});

setTimeout(()=>h.remove(),900);
}
});

3️⃣ UPDATE — JS (replace JS)

JavaScript
// unlock + music
function unlock(){
if(passInput.value==="aishh"){
lockScreen.style.display="none";
music.play();
}else wrong.innerText="Wrong password 💔";
}

// pages cinematic transition
let current=0;
const pages=document.querySelectorAll(".page");
function nextPage(){
pages[current].classList.remove("active");
current++;
if(current<pages.length) pages[current].classList.add("active");
}

// envelope
function openLetter(el){el.classList.toggle("open");}

// proposal buttons
function move(btn){
btn.style.position="absolute";
btn.style.left=Math.random()*80+"%";
btn.style.top=Math.random()*80+"%";
}
function love(){
final.innerText="I knew it ❤️ Forever starts now.";
}

// sparkle particles
const c=document.getElementById("sparkle");
const ctx=c.getContext("2d");
c.width=innerWidth;c.height=innerHeight;
let stars=[];
for(let i=0;i<80;i++)stars.push({x:Math.random()*c.width,y:Math.random()*c.height,r:Math.random()*2});
function draw(){
ctx.clearRect(0,0,c.width,c.height);
stars.forEach(s=>{
ctx.fillStyle="rgba(255,255,255,.8)";
ctx.beginPath();
ctx.arc(s.x,s.y,s.r,0,6.28);
ctx.fill();
s.y+=.2;if(s.y>c.height)s.y=0;
});
requestAnimationFrame(draw);
}
draw();

const ctx=c.getContext("2d");
c.width=innerWidth;
c.height=innerHeight;

let stars=[];
for(let i=0;i<80;i++){
stars.push({
x:Math.random()*c.width,
y:Math.random()*c.height,
r:Math.random()*2
});

function draw(){

stars.forEach(s=>{

✅ Replace your ENTIRE JavaScript with this (final fixed logic)

Open JS panel → delete everything → paste:

JavaScript
// ---------- PAGE CONTROL ----------
const pages = document.querySelectorAll(".page");
let currentPage = 0;
let unlocked = false;

// hide all pages initially
pages.forEach(p => p.classList.remove("active"));

function showPage(i){
  pages.forEach(p => p.classList.remove("active"));
  pages[i].classList.add("active");
}

// next button
function nextPage(){
  if(!unlocked) return;

  if(currentPage < pages.length-1){
    currentPage++;
    showPage(currentPage);
    playPop();
  }
}

// ---------- PASSWORD ----------
function checkPassword(){
  const val = document.getElementById("passInput").value.toLowerCase();

  if(val === "aishh"){
    unlocked = true;
    document.getElementById("lockScreen").style.opacity="0";

    setTimeout(()=>{
      document.getElementById("lockScreen").style.display="none";
      currentPage = 0;
      showPage(0);
      startMusic();
    },600);

  }else{
    alert("Wrong password 😝");
  }
}

// ---------- MUSIC ----------
let musicStarted=false;
function startMusic(){
  if(musicStarted) return;
  musicStarted=true;
  document.getElementById("bgm").play().catch(()=>{});
}

// ---------- ENVELOPE ----------
function openLetter(){
  document.querySelector(".envelope").classList.add("open");
}

// ---------- HEART BURST ----------
function playPop(){
  for(let i=0;i<25;i++){
    let h=document.createElement("div");
    h.className="burstHeart";
    h.style.left=Math.random()*100+"vw";
    h.style.animationDelay=Math.random()*0.5+"s";
    document.body.appendChild(h);
    setTimeout(()=>h.remove(),1500);
  }
}

// ---------- SPARKLES ----------
const canvas=document.getElementById("sparkle");
const ctx=canvas.getContext("2d");
canvas.width=window.innerWidth;
canvas.height=window.innerHeight;

let stars=[];
for(let i=0;i<80;i++){
  stars.push({x:Math.random()*canvas.width,y:Math.random()*canvas.height,r:Math.random()*2});
}

function animate(){
  ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);
  ctx.fillStyle="rgba(255,255,255,.8)";
  stars.forEach(s=>{
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(s.x,s.y,s.r,0,Math.PI*2);
    ctx.fill();
    s.y+=0.3;
    if(s.y>canvas.height) s.y=0;
  });
  requestAnimationFrame(animate);
}
animate();

ChatGPT said:

No worries — the “error” is happening because the script is running before the HTML elements exist (CodePen runs JS instantly).

🔥 Replace your ENTIRE JS with this SAFE version

Delete everything in JS panel and paste this:

JavaScript
// wait until HTML loads
window.addEventListener("load", () => {

  // ---------- ELEMENTS ----------
  const pages = document.querySelectorAll(".page");
  const lockScreen = document.getElementById("lockScreen");
  const passInput = document.getElementById("passInput");
  const music = document.getElementById("bgm");
  const canvas = document.getElementById("sparkle");

  let currentPage = 0;
  let unlocked = false;
  let musicStarted = false;

  // hide all pages at start
  pages.forEach(p => p.classList.remove("active"));

  // ---------- PAGE CONTROL ----------
  function showPage(i){
    pages.forEach(p => p.classList.remove("active"));
    pages[i].classList.add("active");
  }

  window.nextPage = function(){
    if(!unlocked) return;

    if(currentPage < pages.length-1){
      currentPage++;
      showPage(currentPage);
      heartBurst();
    }
  }

  // ---------- PASSWORD ----------
  window.checkPassword = function(){
    const val = passInput.value.toLowerCase();

    if(val === "aishh"){
      unlocked = true;
      lockScreen.style.opacity = "0";

      setTimeout(()=>{
        lockScreen.style.display="none";
        currentPage = 0;
        showPage(0);
        startMusic();
      },600);

    }else{
      alert("Wrong password 😝");
    }
  }

  // ---------- MUSIC ----------
  function startMusic(){
    if(musicStarted) return;
    musicStarted=true;
    music.play().catch(()=>{});
  }

  // ---------- ENVELOPE ----------
  window.openLetter = function(){
    document.querySelector(".envelope").classList.add("open");
  }

  // ---------- HEART BURST ----------
  function heartBurst(){
    for(let i=0;i<25;i++){
      let h=document.createElement("div");
      h.className="burstHeart";
      h.style.left=Math.random()*100+"vw";
      h.style.animationDelay=Math.random()*0.5+"s";
      document.body.appendChild(h);
      setTimeout(()=>h.remove(),1500);
    }
  }

  // ---------- SPARKLES ----------
  if(canvas){
    const ctx=canvas.getContext("2d");
    canvas.width=window.innerWidth;
    canvas.height=window.innerHeight;

    let stars=[];
    for(let i=0;i<80;i++){
      stars.push({x:Math.random()*canvas.width,y:Math.random()*canvas.height,r:Math.random()*2});
    }

    function animate(){
      ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);
      ctx.fillStyle="rgba(255,255,255,.8)";
      stars.forEach(s=>{
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(s.x,s.y,s.r,0,Math.PI*2);
        ctx.fill();
        s.y+=0.3;
        if(s.y>canvas.height) s.y=0;
      });
      requestAnimationFrame(animate);
    }
    animate();
  }

});

Why this fixes EVERYTHING

We wrapped the code inside:

Code
window.addEventListener("load", ...)

So JS runs after HTML loads, meaning:

✔ password works
✔ pages don’t freeze
✔ next button works
✔ sparkle canvas doesn't crash
✔ envelope works

 │    └── employee.java
 ├── Marketing
 │    └── sales.java
 └── mainapp.java

1️⃣ General package → employee.java

Java
package General;

public class employee {

    protected int empid;
    private String ename;
    protected double basic;

    // constructor
    public employee(int id, String name, double basicSalary){
        empid = id;
        ename = name;
        basic = basicSalary;
    }

    // earnings method
    public double earnings(){
        double DA = 0.80 * basic;
        double HRA = 0.15 * basic;
        return basic + DA + HRA;
    }

    public int getEmpId(){
        return empid;
    }
}

2️⃣ Marketing package → sales.java

Java
package Marketing;
import General.employee;

public class sales extends employee {

    public sales(int id, String name, double basicSalary){
        super(id, name, basicSalary);
    }

    // Travelling allowance
    public double tallowance(){
        return 0.05 * earnings();
    }

    // total earning of salesperson
    public double totalEarning(){
        return earnings() + tallowance();
    }
}

3️⃣ Main class → mainapp.java

Java
import java.util.Scanner;
import Marketing.sales;

public class mainapp {
    public static void main(String[] args){

        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

        System.out.println("Enter the employee id and employee name");
        int id = sc.nextInt();
        String name = sc.next();

        System.out.println("Enter the basic salary");
        double basic = sc.nextDouble();

        sales s = new sales(id, name, basic);

        System.out.println("The emp id of the employee is " + s.getEmpId());
        System.out.println("The total earning is " + s.totalEarning());
    }
}

▶️ Compile & Run (Command Prompt)

Open terminal inside EmployeeProject folder

Compile

Bash
javac General/employee.java
javac Marketing/sales.java
javac mainapp.java

OR single line:

Bash
javac General/*.java Marketing/*.java mainapp.java

Run

Bash
java mainapp

🧠 Formula Check (Exam Viva Question)

Basic = 1000

DA = 80% → 800
HRA = 15% → 150

Employee earnings =
1000 + 800 + 150 = 1950

TA = 5% of 1950 → 97.5
Salesperson earning = 1950 + 97.5 = 2047.5

BUT question output asks only employee earnings → 1950.0
